EmailTemplate.name: 2020_Greenhouse_IMUs_Ongoing-Lead-Dark_Nurture.Email 2: Have you seen these vide
EmailTemplate.subject: Have you seen these videos?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Haven’t heard from you in a while, but I want to share a couple videos that I thought you might enjoy.
- Honeywell’s HG4930 survives 80mph hits from a hockey team <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sGWuTsv5rBs&vl=en]]> - HGuide n580 is scorched in the Sonoran Desert with a flame thrower <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Zmt1GuKD8s]]>
Let me know if you’re still interested in talking about our HGuide products.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Best, {{lead.hGuide Sales Owner Full Name:default=Hguide Support}}
